name: Otherworld (itch) (Evs)
description:
What's more fun, sunny plains or Hell?!

Upon launching the game, you'll find yourself in a perfectly pleasant spot of greenery - it's not that fun, but it looks nice. You'll get bored quickly, and respond to the text: "press SPACE". That's when the fun begins.

A/Left Arrow  = Left
D/Right Arrow = Right
W/Up Arrow = Jump
Left Click = Shoot

Made in 3 hours for the TriJam game jam - IS VERY MUCH INCOMPLETE!
